name: Loop the lie
description:
Paradoxical puzzle / parkour game. What you see isn't truth.

You are imprisoned in unknown facility. Mysterious voice is saying that you cant escape.

Gameplay should be around 10 minutes.

Controls:
W = move forward
mouse = look around
left ctrl = run
esc = mouse sensitivity settings

This game was made in a week for Community Game Jam.

Programs used:
Unity
Audacity
Magicavoxel
Paint.NET

Font used: Jupiter Crash
